attributes.action: make playing the National Anthem mandatory before all sporting events, cinema and theatre performances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Follow the USA example and get the audience to stand, hoist a Union Flag and play the National Anthem before the start of all large sporting events, like premiership football or rugby league.  Do the same before the start of films at the cinema and before performances at the theatre.  This would make the British public feel more British and we would all learn the words to the anthem.
